mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.area, a.address, a.phone, a.fax, a.zipCode, a.webSite, a.email, a.emergencyCall, a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date, a.del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_office a WHERE 1 = 1
and ( a.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}), '%') or a.email like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}), '%') or a.area like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}), '%') or a.zipCode like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}), '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office( id, name, area, address, phone, fax, zipCode, webSite, email, emergencyCall, create_by, update_by, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{area}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{zipCode}, #{webSite}, #{email}, #{emergencyCall}, #{create_by}, #{update_by}, #{delFlag} )
